longBusinessSummary.0: JSW Energy Limited generates and sells power in India. The company has a power generation capacity of 4,559 MW, which includes 3,158 MW of thermal, 1,391 MW of hydro, and 10 MW of solar. It has operations in the States of Karnataka, Maharashtra, Rajasthan, Himachal Pradesh, Andhra Pradesh, and West Bengal. The company also engages in power transmission and trading activities; and coal mining in South Africa. JSW Energy Limited was incorporated in 1994 and is based in Mumbai, India.
